set(SUBPRJ "REFL")
message(STATUS "---------------------------")
message(STATUS "Current : ${SUBPRJ}")
add_library(${SUBPRJ} INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(${SUBPRJ} INTERFACE inc)
if(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID MATCHES MSVC)
    target_compile_options(${SUBPRJ} INTERFACE /Zc:preprocessor  /wd5105)
    target_compile_definitions(${SUBPRJ} INTERFACE MICROSOFT_WINDOWS_WINBASE_H_DEFINE_INTERLOCKED_CPLUSPLUS_OVERLOADS=0)
endif()
